onboarding.forgot_pin_description:
Forgot your Pincode?
Enter your seed phrase to reset your pincode.
onboarding.existing_seed_note: It looks like youâ€™ve already set up a wallet. Would you like to use your saved seed or create a new wallet?
onboarding.already_wallet: Already have a wallet? Log In
onboarding.enter_seed: Enter your seed phrase words below.
onboarding.seed_phrase_description: The 24 words below are your seed phrase.
onboarding.seed_phrase_description_2: Your seed phrase is your password to your Litecoin & Wallet. Write it down and keep it safe somewhere secure!
onboarding.seed_warning: WITHOUT THESE WORDS YOU WILL NOT BE ABLE TO ACCESS YOUR WALLET!
onboarding.verify_seed_description: Select word #{{position}} to verify your seed phrase.
onboarding.incorrect_seed: Incorrect word! Check you have written down the correct word.
onboarding.biometric_description: Would you like to use {{biometricType}} to unlock your wallet?
onboarding.presync_description: Your wallet is currently presyncing. This only happens once, and helps speed setting up your Nexus Wallet.
onboarding.invalid_description: This word is not valid - check your spelling and try again.
onboarding.offline_description:
You are offline. 
Connect to the Internet.
onboarding.skip_presync_description: By skipping presync, you'll need to wait for your Nexus Wallet to fully sync before you can send or receive transactions. This process can take up to 30+ minutes.
onboarding.txs_take_time_to_appear: Your transactions will appear here after syncing is completed. Please wait a while.

main.lnd_no_connection: Failed connecting to the Litecoin network. Try using a VPN. If you see this message again, please try another VPN.

buyTab.buy_blocked: Buy Litecoin is currently not available in your country/state.
buyTab.min_sale: Minimum sale of {{minAmount}} LTC & max sale of {{maxAmount}} LTC
buyTab.try_another_currency: The chosen currency is not available - try again with a different currency.

sellTab.sell_blocked: Sell Litecoin is currently not available in your country/state.
sellTab.try_another_currency: The chosen currency is not available - try again with a different currency.

sendTab.camera_note: App will use your camera to scan QR codes for Litecoin Payments
sendTab.enable_camera: Enable Camera to Scan QR Codes
sendTab.try_less_amount: Send a bit less. Network fees eat into your balance, lower the amount for fees.
sendTab.manual_selection_note: Please select coins to match the requested {{amount}} LTC

receiveTab.receive_mweb_description: Receiving privately hides the sender and receiver addresses, and amount being sent.

alertsTab.create_alerts_note: Create alerts to be notified when the price of Litecoin hits a target value.
alertsTab.last_time: Last time LTC reached this value was {{date}}.

settingsTab.have_a_question: Have a question? Our support Team is here to help.
settingsTab.we_away: We are away at the moment
settingsTab.provide_with_name_and_email: Hi, before we connect you with an agent, please let us know your name and email. Describe the issue or problem you are facing in the message box.
settingsTab.name: Name?
settingsTab.connecting_status: We're connecting you with our agents. It might take some time for them to see your message, so feel free to leave a message and pop back in later.
settingsTab.foundation_preamble: Dreamt up & brought to life with love and care by
settingsTab.import_private_key_note: Importing a Litecoin private key moves any Litecoin in that wallet into Nexus.
settingsTab.import_private_key_warning: You will no longer be able to access Litecoin using the private key.
settingsTab.select_block_explorer_note: You can select your preferred block explorer to view transactions.
settingsTab.root_key_description: Your BIP32 root key can be used to derive all addresses and private keys in your wallet.
settingsTab.key_copied_to_clipboard: Key has been copied to clipboard
settingsTab.root_key_warning: WARNING: The extended private key (xprv/Ltpv) gives full access to your Litecoin Wallet. Never share it with anyone.
settingsTab.litewallet_description: Litewallet users can import their coins into Nexus Wallet. Entering your paper key below will permanently move your coins from Litewallet into Nexus.
settingsTab.pincode_invalid: Pincodes did not match. Try again.
settingsTab.reset_warning: Are you absolutely sure you would like to reset your wallet? Backup your seed phrase before resetting.
settingsTab.resetting_wallet_warning: Warning! Resetting your wallet will erase your current seed phrase, back it up first!
settingsTab.mweb_missing_note: Private Litecoin transaction history will be missing if the wallet is recovered in the future.

convertTab.private_to_regular_note: Converting your Private Litecoin to Regular Litecoin will result in 2 different transactions in your wallet. Your balance may be missing until the next Litecoin block (approx 2.5-5 min).

modals.fee_description: Higher fees prioritise your transaction to confirm faster.
